title: Social Change Response Strategies Through Foresight and Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens interested in solving community issues, with the goal of enhancing organizational future-readiness capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners improve the ability to systematically analyze social changes using predictive tools (scenario planning, trend analysis, etc.).
Learners can explain methods for integrating predictive activity results into individual and organizational learning processes.
Learners design sustainable learning models for organizations based on four predictive competencies (scanning, interpreting, applying, evaluating).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
